entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 6.9°C

Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: E 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
